entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
